content.query:
alter database demo2 collate Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8

SELECT
top 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://asadatalake91628xh.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/u2utest/census_income_2.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]




SELECT
    avg([education-num]) as avg_edu, education
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://asadatalake91628xh.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/u2utest/census_income_2.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
group by education
order by 1 DESC


select * from sys.dm_exec_connections
